name: Han, Chewie, And The Falcon (V)
Lore: 'Although tempermental, this trusty hunk of junk always seems to perform for its proud owner and his Wookie co-pilot when needed the most.',
Text: 'Permanent pilots are •Han and •Chewie, who provide ability of 5. Life Debt is canceled. Once per game, may take A Few Maneuvers into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to Come With Me, Lateral Damage, and attrition < 5.',
